name: murderously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an extremely dangerous way, in which someone may get killed or injured: The gang protected its territory murderously. He became murderously obsessed with the family's wealth.
informal in an extremely unpleasant or difficult way: It was a murderously hot afternoon so I sat in the shade reading. It's a beautiful piece of music, but it's murderously difficult to play.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is a murderously powerful tennis player with a killer serve.She was a murderously ambitious woman.The restaurant in the hotel was murderously expensive.
